positively.translation[0].definitions[0]: used to emphasize that something is true, especially when this seems surprising
Some holiday destinations are positively dangerous.
positively.translation[0].definitions[1]: in a way that shows you agree with something or want it to succeed
It is hoped that the industry will respond positively to this new initiative.
positively.translation[0].definitions[2]: in a way that shows you are thinking about what is good in a situation rather than what is bad
They’re encouraged to think positively about themselves and their future.
Change should be accepted and be viewed positively.
positively.translation[0].definitions[3]: in a way that leaves no doubt
The blood was never positively identified as the victim’s.
positively.translation[0].definitions[4]: used to emphasize that you really mean what you are saying
This is positively the last time you’ll hear me say this.
